name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $url
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that is used to identify this questionnaire when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this questionnaire is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the questionnaire. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this questionnaire when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this questionnaire is (or will be) publis

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A formal identifier that is used to identify this questionnaire when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $addidentifier
desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this questionnaire when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this questionnaire when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $::version
desc: Returns: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the questionnaire when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the questionnaire author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the questionnaire when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the questionnaire author and is not expected to be globally unique. For ex

name: $::name
desc: Returns: A natural language name identifying the questionnaire. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the questionnaire. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

name: $title
desc: Returns: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the questionnaire.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the questionnaire.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of this questionnaire. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of this questionnaire. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

name: $experimental
desc: Returns: A boolean value to indicate that this questionnaire is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A boolean value to indicate that this questionnaire is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date  (and optionally time) when the questionnaire was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the questionnaire changes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the questionnaire was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the questionna

name: $publisher
desc: Returns: The name of the individual or organization that published the questionnaire.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the individual or organization that published the questionnaire.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A free text natural language description of the questionnaire from a consumer's perspective.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the questionnaire from a consumer's perspective.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: Explaination of why this questionnaire is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Explaination of why this questionnaire is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

name: $approvalDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

name: $lastReviewDate
desc: Returns: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval, but doesn't change the original approval date.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval, but doesn't change the original approval date.

name: $effectivePeriod
desc: Returns: The period during which the questionnaire content was or is planned to be in active use.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period during which the questionnaire content was or is planned to be in active use.

name: $useContext
desc: Returns: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate questionnaire instances.

name: $adduseContext
desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate questionnaire instances.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate questionnaire instances.

name: $jurisdiction
desc: Returns: A legal or geographic region in which the questionnaire is intended to be used.

name: $addjurisdiction
desc: A legal or geographic region in which the questionnaire is intended to be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the questionnaire is intended to be used.

name: $contact
desc: Returns: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $addcontact
desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

name: $copyright
desc: Returns: A copyright statement relating to the questionnaire and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the questionnaire.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the questionnaire and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the questionnaire.

name: $code
desc: Returns: An identifier for this question or group of questions in a particular terminology such as LOINC.

name: $addcode
desc: An identifier for this question or group of questions in a particular terminology such as LOINC.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An identifier for this question or group of questions in a particular terminology such as LOINC.

name: $subjectType
desc: Returns: The types of subjects that can be the subject of responses created for the questionnaire.

name: $addsubjectType
desc: The types of subjects that can be the subject of responses created for the questionnaire.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The types of subjects that can be the subject of responses created for the questionnaire.

name: $item
desc: Returns: A particular question, question grouping or display text that is part of the questionnaire.

name: $additem
desc: A particular question, question grouping or display text that is part of the questionnaire.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A particular question, question grouping or display text that is part of the questionnaire.
